project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a random password based on user-defined length and criteria.

task.name: Implement password generation logic that includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
Create functionality to accept user input for password length.
Write tests for the password generation functionality to ensure compliance with criteria (e.g., length, inclusion of required character types).
Execute tests on the password generation functionality to verify correctness and robustness.
